dmca.title: DMCA (Copyright) Complaint to Google
dmca.principal_name: Mr. Shashanka Nanda, Mr. Mohan Bhuyan and Mr.

works.description:
In 2009 myself and two friends had been
on  
a visit to the Scindia Railway from Gawlior, India. Our pictures from the 

trip were hosted on www.irfca.org of which I am the administrator as well.
 
Our copyright on the images is clearly mentioned on this website. Despite 

that many pictures from this trip were lifted and claimed as original work
 
by the owners of the below mentioned Blogpsot website.

Kindly remove this blog as it clearly infringes our Intellectual Property.
